Teatralnaya sq., 1   Press Office:   for media Ticket office:  +7 495 455-55-55  sales@bolshoi.ru All contactsYouTubeVkontakteTelegram Season 2024-2025   PremieresOperaBalletConcertsToursGuests on our stages  Historic Stage   Ballet in three acts    A Legend of Love Arif Melikov 23 – 25 May 2025 12+Ballet by John Neumeier in two acts based on the novel of the same name by Leo Tolstoy    Anna Karenina to music by Pyotr Tchaikovsky Alfred Shnitke, Cat Stevens / Yusuf Islam 29 – 30 January 2025 16+Ballet in one act    Chopiniana to music by Frederic Chopin 11 February – 30 April 2025 12+Ballet in three acts    Don Quixote Ludwig Minkus 8 October 2024 – 19 January 2025 6+Ballet in one act    Grand Pas from the ballet Paquita Ludvig Minkus, Edouard Deldevez 11 February – 1 May 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    Ivan the Terrible to music by Sergei Prokofiev 15 – 16 January 2025 16+Ballet in three acts    La Bayadère Ludwig Minkus 28 November 2024 – 6 April 2025 12+Ballet in three acts    La Fille du Pharaon Cesare Pugni 24 October 2024 – 19 April 2025 12+Ballet in three acts    Marco Spada Daniel-François-Esprit Auber 2 – 3 November 2024 12+Ballet in three acts    Raymonda Alexander Glazunov 22 – 23 February 2025 12+Ballet in three acts    Romeo and Juliet Sergei Prokofiev 11 October 2024 – 20 March 2025 12+Ballet in three acts    Spartacus Aram Khachaturyan 25 January – 4 May 2025 12+Ballet in four acts    Swan Lake Pyotr Tchaikovsky 19 September 2024 – 23 March 2025 12+Ballet in two acts   The Little Humpbacked Horse Rodin Shchedrin 29 May – 1 June 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    The Nutcracker Pyotr Tchaikovsky 17 December 2024 – 12 January 2025 6+Ballet by Yuri Possokhov in two acts    The Queen of Spades Pyotr Tchaikovsky – Yuri Krasavin 21 – 23 January 2025 Ballet in two acts    The Sleeping Beauty Pyotr Tchaikovsky 7 September – 21 November 2024 12+New Stage   Ballet in two acts    Anyuta to music by Valery Gavrilin 12 November 2024 – 27 March 2025 12+Ballet in one act     Carmen Suite Georges Bizet–Rodion Shchedrin 19 February – 29 April 2025 16+Ballet in two acts    Cipollino Karen Khachaturyan 5 December 2024 – 9 March 2025 6+Ballet in three acts
    Coppelia Leo Delibes 28 September 2024 – 16 February 2025 12+Ballet in one act    Dancemania Yuri Krasavin 19 – 20 February 2025 12+Ballet   FADING to music by Enrique Granados  29 April 2025 12+One-act ballets program    Four Characters in Search of a Plot  16 – 17 November 2024 12+Ballet in two acts    Giselle Adolphe Adam 2 October 2024 – 16 May 2025 12+Ballet   JUST to music by David Lang 29 April 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    La Sylphide Herman Severin Levenskiold 29 October 2024 – 18 May 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    Master and Margarita to music by Alfred Schnitke and Milko Lazar 4 February – 30 March 2025 16+Ballet   SILENTIUM to music by Arvo Pärt 29 April 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    The Bright Stream Dmitry Shostakovich 13 – 16 March 2025 12+Ballet in two acts    The Flames of Paris Boris Asafiev 11 – 13 April 2025 12+Ballet in four acts    The Seagull Ilya Demutsky 25 September 2024 – 27 April 2025 16+Ballet in three acts    The Tempest Yuri Krasavin 5 October 2024 – 23 April 2025 16+  Go to the old version of the site Switch to old version  Season 2024-2025 What’s onArtists & staffNews Plan your visit About usMuseumPartners
